component.text: 10.0.0.0/8 has been subnetted using the subnet mask /16.
Any of the /16 subnets can be subnetted further. In this example, 10.1.0.0/16 and 10.2.0.0/16 have been subnetted using the /24 mask.
In this example, 10.3.0.0/16 has been subnetted using the /28 mask and 10.4.0.0/16 has been subnetted using the /20 mask.
Individual host addresses are assigned from the "sub-subnets".
